column7: Build quality of the material is good. For this price

Product Name: Honey Touch® Queen Bed | Foam Mattress Included | Folding Style No Assembly Required (Black
column7: I purchased queen size with mattress. I was bit sceptical with build and sturdyness. But I was wrong and it turned out to be surprisingly well build and sturdy. It's comfortably spacious for 2 adults. Convineint as it folds into half. Weighs around 30kg. I would recommend for anyone who change locations often.

Product Name: Honey Touch® Queen Bed | Foam Mattress Included | Folding Style No Assembly Required (Black
column8: it folds well. Since it's sturdy that makes it heavier. Two people can easily unfold the product. Two people can easily fit in this bed. I have brought the product with the mattress and its comfortable. I have used my other Mattress with it to make it more fluffier. Previously
column9: I ordered the same product without mattress and it very uncomfortable. The iron rods in it which you can feel while you sleep if you have the same mattress like I have. ( I have uploaded the video). Though my cotton mattress has good amount of width still I was able to feel the iron rods. Very uncomfortable. I would recommend you to buy the bed with mattress. I recorded the same bed with with mattress. I had a little problem returning this product. Amazon said I would have to courier myself or the third seller regarding return of the product. Amazon has no concern for the return pick up. Sad but true. I called the seller and they arranged a courier for me with the charge of rs 950 to return the bed without mattress. So the service Was not good at all. The bed folds. And portable. That's what I love. I'm loving this bed. Price is little bit high. But I'm satisfied with the product.

column6: This product actually surprised me. I am bachelor I was looking for something to store my socks and to sit and wear my shoes comfortably. Other products actually cost a lot and I didn't want to churn out so much. I ordered this with a hesitation. But when I opened the package and fixed I was actually surprised by the fit and finish of the product. There was no unnecessary ropes or unfinished stitches hanging around. This is really the perfect product I was looking for. I usually don't write such lengthly reviews. This product deserves it. The quality at this price point is amazing. If you ask me if this will hold for more than a couple of years. Ir depends on your usage. I'm just gonna use it to sit and wear my shoes and store the socks.

Reviewer Name: The product is exactly what it promised
column5: a no frills good looking economical shoe rack made of MDF and assembled plates. The package is deceptively small with all screws and plates and other connectors included
column6: well packed and labelled. It's very sturdy once assembled properly. The assembly itself is not a breeze. It takes around two hours plus at a leisurely pace for a non-pro. Also you would need screwdrivers and probably a drill if you don't follow the instructions to the T. There are some nails involved too
column7: so may be difficult to take apart if you have messed up something. So be careful and read the manual properly before starting.

Product Name: A couple of fittings needed the holes to be made larger. Overall it's a fun experience assembling it if you are into DIY or else probably best to take the paid assembly service.
The only negative is that if you have size 10 or larger shoes
Rating: you would probably would need to keep them a little tilted to make the door close properly.

Reviewer Name: The product is ok. The thickness of the wood and the overall quality is not worth the money I paid I feel. Could have got it made locally for a little lesser.

Product Name: Main problem is the assembly instructions are not clear enough. You can easily go wrong and fit some part upside down or front side back and realise it very late. Then reopen and reattaching makes it loose. Took hours. So don't buy unless u alwo get professional to assemble.
Second problem is wobble. The base legs are not level and I had to put a paper below one leg to stabilize.
One peg missing. The shelves are placed on small plastic pegs and I got one less. Had to use some out screw I had in its place. Small issue.
Looks good though from a distance and in photos. But when you open the door it feels it is light
3 stars just because it looks good from a distance and does the job.

Rating: Home & Outdoor Fits at All Places (Set of 4 Chairs) (Grey Set of 4)
Reviewer Name: This chair was exactly what I was looking for. Since I had a very tight budget and the chairs I wanted cost nearly 8k each in real wood
column5: I decided this was the perfect alternative solution. I knew it would look great with my home's aesthetic and along with my round pedestal dining table (which is also custom made) The chair is made of firm high quality plastic and feels good to touch. It's comfortable and the height is standard. The faux rattan looks great from afar and in photos and one only notices that it's plastic upon close inspection. I'm planning to buy cushion for these from Amazon at some point but it looks stunning and feels comfortable as it is. Best part is they are stackable and if I were to buy real wood chairs tomorrow for the dining table
column6: I can continue to use these in different parts of home and they will look attractive everywhere. Seller missed the delivery date and was unresponsive
column7: but the product is legitimate and of high quality. Thank you.

Review Text: The entire assembly is conditioned to be 'hung' on the wall on just 2 screws. The weight of the assembled shelf is quite heavy for just two screws. Adding personal display items would further add to the weight. There was a good fear of damaging the wall itself. The service agent also said no to installing the shelf on the wall and just assembled the product as he did not want to take the responsibility of the shelf+wall stability post installation. The agent left the product lying on the floor and we had to call another carpenter out of personal capacity to put it on the wall firmly. This was highly inconvenient. We were charged by Amazon for complete installation while the reality was that the Amazon's agent only assembled the product.

column7: I purchased queen size with mattress. I was bit sceptical with build and sturdyness. But I was wrong and it turned out to be surprisingly well build and sturdy. It's comfortably spacious for 2 adults. Convineint as it folds into half. Weighs around 30kg. I would recommend for anyone who change locations often.

Product Name: Honey Touch® Queen Bed | Foam Mattress Included | Folding Style No Assembly Required (Black
column8: it folds well. Since it's sturdy that makes it heavier. Two people can easily unfold the product. Two people can easily fit in this bed. I have brought the product with the mattress and its comfortable. I have used my other Mattress with it to make it more fluffier. Previously
column9: I ordered the same product without mattress and it very uncomfortable. The iron rods in it which you can feel while you sleep if you have the same mattress like I have. ( I have uploaded the video). Though my cotton mattress has good amount of width still I was able to feel the iron rods. Very uncomfortable. I would recommend you to buy the bed with mattress. I recorded the same bed with with mattress. I had a little problem returning this product. Amazon said I would have to courier myself or the third seller regarding return of the product. Amazon has no concern for the return pick up. Sad but true. I called the seller and they arranged a courier for me with the charge of rs 950 to return the bed without mattress. So the service Was not good at all. The bed folds. And portable. That's what I love. I'm loving this bed. Price is little bit high. But I'm satisfied with the product.

I would suggest to look for other options instead of this one.

Review Text: Offers good value for the money
Reviewer Name: especially if you enjoy DIY projects. The satisfaction of assembling it yourself is a nice perk. However
column5: the material quality isn’t the best. The veneer is quite delicate and can be easily damaged if you’re not careful during assembly.

Product Name: Speaking of assembly
Rating: I encountered a few issues. For instance
Review Text: I attached two of the legs in the wrong direction
Reviewer Name: which meant redoing that part. This mistake caused the threads to loosen
column6: it remained usable. The process of screwing in the screws was also challenging
column7: but the stability of the table once assembled is worth the effort.

Product Name: Including the rubber pads on the legs is a important requirement. It would have been even better if the table included options like a cable management tray
Review Text: the assembly guide could be improved—perhaps with a QR code linking to a detailed setup video to make things easier.

Product Name: Overall
Rating: The table is a solid buy for its price.

Rating: Home & Outdoor Fits at All Places (Set of 4 Chairs) (Green Set of 4)
Reviewer Name: This chair was exactly what I was looking for. Since I had a very tight budget and the chairs I wanted cost nearly 8k each in real wood
column5: I decided this was the perfect alternative solution. I knew it would look great with my home's aesthetic and along with my round pedestal dining table (which is also custom made) The chair is made of firm high quality plastic and feels good to touch. It's comfortable and the height is standard. The faux rattan looks great from afar and in photos and one only notices that it's plastic upon close inspection. I'm planning to buy cushion for these from Amazon at some point but it looks stunning and feels comfortable as it is. Best part is they are stackable and if I were to buy real wood chairs tomorrow for the dining table
column6: I can continue to use these in different parts of home and they will look attractive everywhere. Seller missed the delivery date and was unresponsive
column7: but the product is legitimate and of high quality. Thank you.

column5: I was a bit sceptical about ordering a sofa set online. But took a chance with this. This is as good if not better than getting it from a wood furniture store near your place. I ordered this 3+2+1 set. The delivery took some time as it was festive season. But we unboxed it. The only problem is that this is DIY and it is not easy. If you like DIY then it's very good. Or else you will face some difficulty. But the seller is very good. I stay in Bangalore and he arranged a furniture guy who would help me setup the furniture. If you do DIY then please start with the smallest box which is the single piece sofa.

Product Name: The wood is very good. Sheesham is top notch quality. It has been close to a month and there is no creaking sound as well even though I did the DIY. The cushion is not that hard neither it is too soft. My father has lower back issue and he is able to sit comfortably.
Go ahead and try this sofa!!
NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column7: the seller contacted to know the preference of color

column5: If you are looking for a slim fit product then go for it. Cushion provided could have been better as they do not fit good. You need to rearrange them multiple times in a day. Wood is good but did not get the right polish though I sent them the message with preferred polish with the order I'd. Also the vendor doesn't respond to the query. Assembling took a while as there is no guide/video or numbering (not detailed one) on the parts. Some places screws provided won't make good binding between parts. I would say the furniture is comfortable once it is arranged properly and it is quite a slim fit. But the service can be improved by providing regular update and not delaying the shipment.

Rating: Home & Outdoor Fits at All Places (Set of 4 Chairs) (Green Set of 4)
Reviewer Name: This chair was exactly what I was looking for. Since I had a very tight budget and the chairs I wanted cost nearly 8k each in real wood
column5: I decided this was the perfect alternative solution. I knew it would look great with my home's aesthetic and along with my round pedestal dining table (which is also custom made) The chair is made of firm high quality plastic and feels good to touch. It's comfortable and the height is standard. The faux rattan looks great from afar and in photos and one only notices that it's plastic upon close inspection. I'm planning to buy cushion for these from Amazon at some point but it looks stunning and feels comfortable as it is. Best part is they are stackable and if I were to buy real wood chairs tomorrow for the dining table
column6: I can continue to use these in different parts of home and they will look attractive everywhere. Seller missed the delivery date and was unresponsive
column7: but the product is legitimate and of high quality. Thank you.

Product Name: NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column5: I was a bit sceptical about ordering a sofa set online. But took a chance with this. This is as good if not better than getting it from a wood furniture store near your place. I ordered this 3+2+1 set. The delivery took some time as it was festive season. But we unboxed it. The only problem is that this is DIY and it is not easy. If you like DIY then it's very good. Or else you will face some difficulty. But the seller is very good. I stay in Bangalore and he arranged a furniture guy who would help me setup the furniture. If you do DIY then please start with the smallest box which is the single piece sofa.

Product Name: The wood is very good. Sheesham is top notch quality. It has been close to a month and there is no creaking sound as well even though I did the DIY. The cushion is not that hard neither it is too soft. My father has lower back issue and he is able to sit comfortably.
Go ahead and try this sofa!!
NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column7: the seller contacted to know the preference of color
column8: and was delivered on time. The package comes along with the necessary tools to assemble the sofa.

Product Name: NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column5: If you are looking for a slim fit product then go for it. Cushion provided could have been better as they do not fit good. You need to rearrange them multiple times in a day. Wood is good but did not get the right polish though I sent them the message with preferred polish with the order I'd. Also the vendor doesn't respond to the query. Assembling took a while as there is no guide/video or numbering (not detailed one) on the parts. Some places screws provided won't make good binding between parts. I would say the furniture is comfortable once it is arranged properly and it is quite a slim fit. But the service can be improved by providing regular update and not delaying the shipment.

Review Text: We checked out a lot of beds before taking the plunge with Amazon
Reviewer Name: it was a well made decision in the end.

Product Name: We got a quality product at half the price range of King Size bed from other merchants/Showrooms in Mumbai.
The wood quality is very good and very smooth.
The storage drawers below the bed are smooth and easy to operate with quality finishing. Also the storage is huge. Solved a lot of problem for us.
The headboard storage compartment is quite usable as well-fit 3-4 books and iPad Air comfortably.
Assembly is to be done with Carpenter provided by the seller. I couldn`t do it.
This is easily one of the best product that i have bought from Amazon.

Review Text: I used the product for a year now. The cloth at the knee junction on the couch is torn due to friction and when I raised an issue with customer care they said that this is not covered under warranty.

Product Name: So if this is not covered in warranty then I can review the product as below:
-The recliner works well and is comfortable but the overall build is weak.
-The cloth cover of the sofa easily gets torn due to friction between the leg rest and the couch.
- Within a year the if the cloth is tearing this tells about the quality.
I would suggest to look for other options instead of this one.

Product Name: NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column5: I was a bit sceptical about ordering a sofa set online. But took a chance with this. This is as good if not better than getting it from a wood furniture store near your place. I ordered this 3+2+1 set. The delivery took some time as it was festive season. But we unboxed it. The only problem is that this is DIY and it is not easy. If you like DIY then it's very good. Or else you will face some difficulty. But the seller is very good. I stay in Bangalore and he arranged a furniture guy who would help me setup the furniture. If you do DIY then please start with the smallest box which is the single piece sofa.

Product Name: The wood is very good. Sheesham is top notch quality. It has been close to a month and there is no creaking sound as well even though I did the DIY. The cushion is not that hard neither it is too soft. My father has lower back issue and he is able to sit comfortably.
Go ahead and try this sofa!!
NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column7: the seller contacted to know the preference of color

Product Name: After delivery I realised that the height from ground to seating is not sufficient for us (not mentioned in the description) informed the seller about the same

Product Name: NATRAJ ART & CRAFT Sheesham Wood 6 Seater Sofa Set for Living Room Wooden Sofa Set for Living Room Furniture (3+2+1
column5: If you are looking for a slim fit product then go for it. Cushion provided could have been better as they do not fit good. You need to rearrange them multiple times in a day. Wood is good but did not get the right polish though I sent them the message with preferred polish with the order I'd. Also the vendor doesn't respond to the query. Assembling took a while as there is no guide/video or numbering (not detailed one) on the parts. Some places screws provided won't make good binding between parts. I would say the furniture is comfortable once it is arranged properly and it is quite a slim fit. But the service can be improved by providing regular update and not delaying the shipment.

column5: Bought two of these wardrobes for a great price.

The best thing that I would like to highlight is the after sales service. The manufacturer can be easily contacted over whatsapp for missing parts or broken parts. They even got me a replacement part without hesitation when I requested over whatsapp. All you need to do is send images and your order ID along with adress to them over whatsapp. Contact information is given with the product in a brochure.
Would highly recommend for people living on rent to minimize expenses on furniture.

Product Name: It gives a thinking broader is better for broader laptops and so on

But going by wrist anatomy the laptop should be placed flat on a table which is at a height where your wrist is touching keys while holding a tennis ball and you are sitting squarely in a stool with your elbow joint forming L angle. This is the position for long hours of usage
The stand makes the laptop at at an angle making the wrist flat which is totally a wrong posture
The stand can be used for watching movies and reading books as e-reader like iPad or other brands tablets. You can slant the tablet according to your cervical convenience
No doubt the stand is well made

Reviewer Name: This chair was exactly what I was looking for. Since I had a very tight budget and the chairs I wanted cost nearly 8k each in real wood
column5: I decided this was the perfect alternative solution. It's comfortable and the height is standard. The faux rattan looks great from afar and in photos and one only notices that it's plastic upon close inspection. I'm planning to buy cushion for these from Amazon at some point but it looks stunning and feels comfortable as it is. Best part is they are stackable and if I were to buy real wood chairs tomorrow for the dining table
column6: I can continue to use these in different parts of home and they will look attractive everywhere. Seller missed the delivery date and was unresponsive
column7: but the product is legitimate and of high quality. Thank you.

INNOWIN Jazz High Back Office Chair | Mesh Ergonomic Chair with Multi-Tilt Lock
Review Text: Strong Nylon Base | Home & Office Seating (Black)
column5: Buying furnitures on amazon is certainly not something i would do very often based on past experiences.

Product Name: But this one is different. Was looking for a good mesh chair suitable for work from home / home office purpose. Straightaway
Rating: the number of positive reviews was the only reason i shortlisted this product. I was a little sceptical if i would get the expected quality. I would segregate the review in pros and cons and why i rated this 4 stars.

Product Name: Pros-
1) does what it says (ergonomic) and is really comfortable for long hours of work
2) adjustable arm rests. I didn't understand the importance of adjustable arm rests until i used one. While working
Rating: the most comfortable position is when the elbow and the wrist are at same horizontal level. Adjusting the seating height often disturbs that level and that is where adjustable armrests come in need.

Product Name: 3) the pentagon legs look very light but are actually quite adequate in weight which gives the confidence to lean back without losing balance. Reclines well without any noise or issues. They perfectly balanced the recline pressure (not too soft
4) i am a pretty heavy guy (93kgs and 6ft. tall) and this chair is comfortable for my anthropometric ratios. Good lumbar support.

5) mesh quality is good and fairly tight enough. The seat is padded nicely and has that mesh finish which is doesn't let you sweat. The headrest is just okay and has an adjustable height. Obviously having a headrest is a big advantage when you lean back during long hours of work and gives the chair a very attractive look too.
6) easy installation
Cons-

1) The headrest support bar seems to be made of plastic which makes it look not so premium or sturdy if you look closely. I understand they had to make the top portion of the chair lighter hence they went for plastic over metal. I tried resting my head on the headrest which was good enough. Seems to have a little bit of spring action. No problems there but i would like to test out how it stands out in terms of durability over time since the support bar is plastic. I am sure the company must have given it a thought before releasing this model. Could have been a better head support in terms of pivot point too.

2) the adjustable armrest has a little bit of wiggle/play to it. And thats only when you look for it. I guess that is because of the fact that it is adjustable. During normal usage you won't notice that play/wiggle in the armrest.
3) the Hydraulic piston which helps the chair seat to go up and down
Rating: is a little bit on the harder side when you sit. Upward movement is good but it's a little less smooth when you sit. I've used better and smoother hydraulics in chairs cheaper than this. But thats only in terms of smoothness/hardness. The harder piston makes me think that this won't stay very smooth during long term usage but I can't really say that until I've used the chair for a longer time. So durability of the hard hydraulics is something which i will decide upon later. Keeping this in mind
Review Text: its not a deal breaker. Still okay to use.

Product Name: 4) this chair is perfect for a person who is fairly tall. My legs reach the floor just perfectly when the piston is at mid or low adjusted piston height. I have another office chair which can go little bit further down in terms of sitting height (good for medium or short height people).
5) the chair is a little bit on the costlier side of the range. The price makes me want to believe
Rating: they could have reduced the price a little in order to justify all the points made above. I got it for 8.6k. maybe 7.5k would have been a really compelling price where i wouldn't have complained about the cons. But at 8.6k
Review Text: i really needed to bring out the cons too.

Product Name: Finally
Rating: i feel they've done a pretty good job at manufacturing and shipping a mesh chair is comfortable
Review Text: ergonomic and also looks elegant. Mesh chairs are a must have for work environments.

Product Name: Read more
INNOWIN Jazz High Back Office Chair | Mesh Ergonomic Chair with Multi-Tilt Lock
Review Text: Strong Nylon Base | Home & Office Seating (Black)
column5: Comfortable chair with awesome build quality

Product Name: INNOWIN Jazz High Back Office Chair | Mesh Ergonomic Chair with Multi-Tilt Lock
Review Text: Strong Nylon Base | Home & Office Seating (Black)
column5: I was looking at lot of options for ergonomic high back chairs and finally decided to give this one a try after going through reviews. In my opinion this is the best choice in this price range. Overall this chair almost gets everything right
column6: except for the headrest. Here are few pros and cons in my observation

Product Name: Pros:
- Great general back support
Rating: you don't need any extra lumbar support. (Subjective)

Product Name: - Back support tilts independently from seat
Rating: they are not welded together like many other chairs in this price range. Also has adjustable stiffness for right comfort.

Product Name: - Back support can be locked in any position you like.
- height adjustable armrests.
- decent cushioning on seat
Rating: sturdy and breathable mesh on the back support.

Product Name: - strong and silent wheels. No wheel rotation though. Heavy wheel base overall
Rating: no need to fear about falling when you fully lean backwards. (Most common fear among office chair users) :)

Product Name: - Quality gas piston for smooth height adjustment.
- quick and super easy assembly
Rating: no additional tools required other than the one provided in the package.

Product Name: Cons:
- headrest is the biggest disappointment part for this great chair. It is flimsy ans do not serve exactly as intended. You better keep it off the chair. ( it is detachable luckily)
- plastic finishing could have been better
Rating: have few sharp edges at few places.

Product Name: - little more packaging care is needed
Rating: foam wrapping on seat and armrests could have prevented the minor damages that i have on my piece.

Product Name: This chair almost mimics the functionality of expensive chairs we see in workplaces
Review Text: we need to see the price range this product is offered in. That makes this Chair a great pick for the price. Hope this review helps.

Don't know how durable it is
Reviewer Name: time will tell. As of now it is looking good and was designed to last long.

Reviewer Name: however MDF plywood is slim and thicker one would give better durability.

Product Name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Petra Solid Sheesham Wood Queen Bed (Teak Finish)
Review Text: Nice and sturdy bed ..it came with installation so did not face any issues at all... working good .. Thank you amazon for the wonderful experience

Product Name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Petra Solid Sheesham Wood Queen Bed (Teak Finish)
Review Text: Cot is very nice. Sheehan wood teak finish. But only 78 length is available which is too lengthy may not be needed for all. 75 inch length would have been better. We also need to buy mattress with length 78inch again which will increase the cost. It has six legs because of the length. Only drawback with cot is it has a middle leg which is too dangerous. Unknowingly our feet always hits to the middle leg thus getting hurt always. We need to be careful until we get used to it.

Review Text: At the time of placing the order
Reviewer Name: I was assured installation of the product within 48 hours of delivery. The product was delivered on 16th October 2022. However there is no installation technician sent to assemble the product. On calling Amazon customer care
column5: they only assure that the problem will be resolved within 48 hours n that the complaint has been raised... again after 48 hours they say that they have escalated the complaint. column6: warranty will be void. The return date closed on 26th Oct.

Review Text: I purchased beAAtho® Leo Ergonomically Adjustable Executive High Back chair on 03.05.2024. The product is good. Assembly was easy.

- Easy to self assemble. No need to call 3rd party agency.
- The recliner is cosy and comfortable. It has great lumber support.
- The automatic reclining mechanism works well.
Can be improved:
- The seat is narrow in width and suitable for average size individual. I have 38 waist and just enough to fit in. Oversized buns will not fit
- The chair is light on legs and it moves easily with little force.
- The seat position is bit high from ground so that an avg person's (with height of 5'3") feet won't rest/touch floor in upright sitting position.

- Easy to self assemble. No need to call 3rd party agency.
- The recliner is cosy and comfortable. It has great lumber support.
- The automatic reclining mechanism works well.
Can be improved:
- The seat is narrow in width and suitable for average size individual. I have 38 waist and just enough to fit in. Oversized buns will not fit
- The chair is light on legs and it moves easily with little force.
- The seat position is bit high from ground so that an avg person's (with height of 5'3") feet won't rest/touch floor in upright sitting position.

column5: I was a bit sceptical about ordering a sofa set online. But took a chance with this. This is as good if not better than getting it from a wood furniture store near your place. I ordered this 3+2+1 set. The delivery took some time as it was festive season. But we unboxed it. The only problem is that this is DIY and it is not easy. If you like DIY then it's very good. Or else you will face some difficulty. But the seller is very good. I stay in Bangalore and he arranged a furniture guy who would help me setup the furniture. If you do DIY then please start with the smallest box which is the single piece sofa.

Product Name: The wood is very good. Sheesham is top notch quality. It has been close to a month and there is no creaking sound as well even though I did the DIY. The cushion is not that hard neither it is too soft. My father has lower back issue and he is able to sit comfortably.
Go ahead and try this sofa!!

column5: If you are looking for a slim fit product then go for it. Cushion provided could have been better as they do not fit good. You need to rearrange them multiple times in a day. Wood is good but did not get the right polish though I sent them the message with preferred polish with the order I'd. Also the vendor doesn't respond to the query. Assembling took a while as there is no guide/video or numbering (not detailed one) on the parts. Some places screws provided won't make good binding between parts. I would say the furniture is comfortable once it is arranged properly and it is quite a slim fit. But the service can be improved by providing regular update and not delaying the shipment.

Product Name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Petra Solid Sheesham Wood Queen Bed (Teak Finish)
Review Text: Cot is very nice. Sheehan wood teak finish. But only 78 length is available which is too lengthy may not be needed for all. 75 inch length would have been better. We also need to buy mattress with length 78inch again which will increase the cost. It has six legs because of the length. Only drawback with cot is it has a middle leg which is too dangerous. Unknowingly our feet always hits to the middle leg thus getting hurt always. We need to be careful until we get used to it.

Product Name: Nilkamal SLEEP Acacia Luxurious King Size Wooden Bed
Rating: Hardwood with Sturdy Construction & Easy to Assemble (78 x 72
column5: After using this bed for almost a full month now

Product Name: We were initially skeptical of ordering such a product online but after observing the prices in the market for solid beds (online and offline)
The good stuff about the bed:
1. Sturdy
2. Made of solid wood
3. The nuts and screws provided with the bed are of really good quality and are tough.
4. It does not attract dust! The maintenance is minimal.
5. It is simple
6. The assembly was immediately done after delivery and took 10 mins or so.
One thing I want buyers to note is to wipe the bed with a damp cloth before first use. The polish or whatever substance is there
Rating: will otherwise stick to your mattress. Our white mattress caught red marks as we slid it onto the bed.

Product Name: Also
Rating: air the bed for a couple of days after assembly
Review Text: to get rid of the new wood smell.

Product Name: All in all
Rating: a satisfying purchase. I would recommend.

Rating: Hardwood with Sturdy Construction & Easy to Assemble (78 x 72
column5: Had purchased this bed back in December 2023
column6: although got it installed only in February 2024. Amazon was kind enough to let me reschedule the free installation appointment multiple times. Coming to the installation
column7: the technician visited as per the schedule and installed it very quickly.

Product Name: Coming to the bed itself
Rating: the design is simple and elegant. The bed frame is strong
Review Text: no creaking sounds or anything. You can easily feel the sturdiness of the bed. And its pretty heavy
Reviewer Name: need to make some effort to move the bed.

Product Name: The bottom support is decent plywood (10-12 mm thickness
Rating: I think). Overall for the 18k (post discounts) I paid

Product Name: Even though the wood used would be acacia (not an expert
Review Text: there are joints on the outer frame
Reviewer Name: it is done in a good manner
column5: but just pointing out that it isn't a single piece of wood for each side. It didn't come with a floor protector bush for the legs
column6: I am planning to install one otherwise can damage the floor if moved.

Product Name: May 2024 - Update - So towards late April
Rating: I started noticing creaking sounds when using the bed
Review Text: and the head board appeared loose. I reached out to support [@] nilkamalsleep.com
Reviewer Name: and they were very prompt to arrange a technician visit free of cost. Within the next day or so
column5: a team of two arrived and quickly fixed the issue. It was an issue where the bolt holding the headboard had become loose. They said on one side the bolt was pretty loose
column6: so he suspected it was not tightened enough during installation which could have made everything loose due to the movement.

Product Name: The technicians showed the bolts which could potentially become a bit loose in the future
Rating: and asked me to just tighten it by hand with the supplied spanner.

Product Name: Overall
Rating: a very positive experience with Nilkamal support.

Product Name: Just a few things I want to point out:
